text: Borderline is a 1980 drama movie directed by Jerrold Freedman and stars Charles Bronson, Ed Harris, Kenneth McMillan, and Bruno Kirby. == Other websites == * * Category:1980 drama movies Category:1980s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Jerrold Freedman Category:Movies set in San Diego Category:Movies set in Mexico
title: Borderline (1980 movie)
